body: $PQEFF so i was wondering why they have an undisclosed impairment charge. If you read this report they told the epa they are dismantling the plant. Seems strange one would do that if you are working to find people to license your tech. Seeing is believing in the world of oil and gas.
"The current Petroteq facility is a demonstration plant. Petroteq has no intention of running the current plant unless investors want to see it operate
created_at: and they plan to keep the plant until the end of the year (2021). The plant has not operated since July 2021 except for drying sand. From May-July 2021
column3: Valkor processed 980 cubic yards of tar sand ore. Petroteq/Valkor is not interested in mining at this mine site anymor"
